content.rendered:
Directed by Vidhu Vinod Chopra

Written by Vidhu Vinod Chopra. Abhijat Joshi. Rahul Pandita

Cast Sadia Khateeb (Shanti Dhar). Aadil Khan (Shiv Kumar Dhar). Zain Khan Durrani (Lateef Lone). Priyanshu Chatterjee (Naveen Zutshi). Bhavna Chauhan (Aarti Kachru). Ashwin Dhar (Mohanlal). Farid Azad Khan (Rehmana). Saghar Sehrai (Haji Saab). Mushtaq Kak (Masood Saab). Vinay Raina (Shiv’s Father). Anjna Sood (Shiv’s Mother). Faiyaz Dilbar (Shanti’s Father). Shahid Lateef (Political Leader Yunis). Purnendu Bhattacharya (Colonel Bhattacharya). Ravi Braroo (Raina). Muazzam Bhat (Zakir). Zamir Ashai (Khursheed Hassan Lone). Imran Farooq (Shafi Mohammed). Faisal Simon (Dr. Lalit Ladru). Raees Khan (Rashida). Ajay Kaul (Manoharlal Kaul). Pankaj Handoo (Man Visited to Buy House). Udita Bhalla (Heroine). Moosa Salim (Salim Qureshi). Madhav Dhingra (Kid Ladroo). Payal Arora (Matron). Hafsa Ashraf (Bitti – Girl Kid). Illu Chauhan (Bus Conductor). Vinay Dagar (Man In Bus 1). Atul Duggal (Jawan). Sanjeev Gupta (Registration Officer At Jammu 1). Abhijat Joshi (Film Director). Abhya Joshi (Tomato Distributor). Rahul Kilam (Raina’s Son). Sandeep Kumar (Man in Bus 2). Tabraiz Madani (Inspector at Amira Kadal). Shaukat Magre (Assistant Doctro At Govt Hospital). Late Bansilal Matoo (Old Man at Camp). Scott Milburn (Kashmiri Pandit). Shikhar Misra (Pandit With The Calf). Kunal Narula (Hotel Manager). Ashok Vinay Pandita (Travel Agent). Pyarelal Pandita (Pandit Man In Bus 1). Rajendra Kumar Pandita (Pandit Man in Bus 2). Sudarshan Patil (Captain). Salim Qureshi (Courier Man). Kamlesh Sadrani (Cameraman). Mohd Sadiq Shah (Bachnagma Dance). Asthasoom Sharma (2nd Assistant Director). Amit Singh (Hero). Jatan Singh Soni (Producer). Vipul Tak (Hotel Executive At Airport). Sandeep Verma (Registration Officer at Jammu 2)

Languages Hindi

Producers Vidhu Vinod Chopra. Atul Duggal. Atul Vinod Duggal. Abhay S. Dutta. Yogesh Ishwar. Dharmendra Rawal. Ajay Sharma

Production Vinod Chopra Production
